original_title: 修学旅行中にボッチでいた僕は隣のクラスの女子に誘われて自由時間に東京デートして何度も何度も中出ししまくった。 こなつちゃん
overview: A miracle that happened because of me. During my free time on a school trip, a cute girl from the next class called out to me when I was alone. There was also a rumor that she has a boyfriend. Why did she want to do something like me..."Why don't you go out with me?" "Let's take a break?" He invited me with an innocent smile... At the first hotel I entered, I did something naughty for the first time. The two who got close to each other had sex over and over again during the school trip.
title: I was a bum on a school trip and a girl in the next class invited me to a Tokyo date during my free time and I cum inside her over and over again. Konatsu-chan
